text: Pouya Seif Panahi (;born August 13, 1986) is an Iranian footballer who played for Zob Ahan in Iran's Premier Football League. ==Club career== In 2009, Seif Panahi joined Pas Hamedan. ===Club Career Statistics=== *Last Update: 20 April 2015 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
